results.content: i have done fiori training and there a lot more was explained there than this odata class, but yes this course was little helpful for clearing some concepts. but there are 3 other ways different ways of creating odata services. some are recommended and some are not recommended approaches, but it is good to know all. this odata training covered only one approach.

results.content:
The material is quite straightforward explaining the fundamental concept of RESTfull technology, and architecture.
The trainer (Raju) also have shown a very clear step by step guidance. Very easy to understand how to get a record, a table, and create data through OData services. Thanks for Raju for creating a very good tutorial and Udemy for providing this learning platform.
results.content_html:
The material is quite straightforward explaining the fundamental concept of RESTfull technology, and architecture.
The trainer (Raju) also have shown a very clear step by step guidance. Very easy to understand how to get a record, a table, and create data through OData services. Thanks for Raju for creating a very good tutorial and Udemy for providing this learning platform.

results.content: Not as per expectation. Has very very basic hands on sections. Was expecting CREATE_DEEP_ENTITY, Error/ Exception Handling, Authorization but it is missing. At least one real time case study.

response.content:
Dear Prathamesh.. Apologies for not meeting your expectations. This is a basic course to wrap up in 2 hours.. Please do check the syllabus.

We cannot cover those concepts and exercises in 2 hours.

We are helping participants to get a kick start. Then they then dive deep themselves with the basic concepts.

Team SAPYard.
response.content_html:
Dear Prathamesh.. Apologies for not meeting your expectations. This is a basic course to wrap up in 2 hours.. Please do check the syllabus.

We cannot cover those concepts and exercises in 2 hours.

We are helping participants to get a kick start. Then they then dive deep themselves with the basic concepts.

Team SAPYard.

Team SAPYard.
